name: Explore Fushimi Inari
summary: Experience a detailed, realistically designed recreation of the renowned Japanese shrine, Fushimi Inari Taisha. Explore the expansive Kyoto mountainside in first person, take photos with the in-game camera, immerse yourself in an atmosphere reminiscent of the real place.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 开发: caves rd
  • 发行: caves rd
  • 发行日期: 2019年10月11日
